author: Mazzl
post_text: June 16, 2020 at 11:19 AM#1Hey guysI got a left-right dimmer effect which uses Blocks of x (all fixtures divided by 2).Is there any way I can automate this?Something like: Grab group x - divide by 2 - set blocks to x/2?GreetingsMazzlGlühdraht LightdesignGermany
title: Dividing Fixtures
